item.title: Meta partners with Midjourney on AI image and video models
item.description: Meta's chief AI officer said that the company is partnering with Midjourney to license its AI image and video model technology.

item.title: Apple gets ready for AI in the enterprise with new ChatGPT configuration options
item.description: Apple will let businesses configure ChatGPT enterprise access in the fall.

item.title: US government plans to take a 10% stake in Intel
item.description: Such federal government ownership of a major corporation would mark a dramatic departure from long-standing U.S. policy.
